problem.p: Which of the statements below are true about the total energy of the block-spring system? Check all that apply.

choice.text: The total energy of the block-spring system at x = A is the same as the total energy at x = 0
The total energy of the block-spring system at x = A is the same as the total energy at x = -A
The total energy of the block-spring system at x = A is the same as the total energy at x = A/2
The total energy of the block-spring system at x = A is the same as the total energy at any value of x
